name: Leopard Survival Life Simulator: Animal of Prey
name_original: Leopard Survival Life Simulator: Animal of Prey
description:
The most exciting battle of leopard has begun in a faraway island full with dangerous from fierce , scary and frightening wild animals . Only the strongest one will survive and become the ultimate animal . To play this game is just to control leopard to fight or attack via joystick . This is realistic simulator game of wild animals fighting for survival has begun !!!
In this dangerous island is full of fierce and frightening wild animals such as Tiger have sharp teeth for biting and tearing flesh meat , Lion or the king of the jungle which is fierce carnivore , fox is clever and nimble and many more living this island . The strongest one will survive in this land . It is necessary to hunt , kill , the enemy as much as you can to become the ultimate animal and also have to eliminate the giant boss in each zone .
The leopard is one of the five "big cats" in the genus Panthera. Leopard is an agile and opportunistic hunter. It’s able to climb trees, even when carrying heavy prey, and often choose to rest on tree branches during the day . It is the main character in this free game .

◆◆◆ HOW TO PLAY ◆◆◆
- Control the character by joystick to kill enemies
- Upgrade the ability
- Fight boss in each zone.

◆◆◆ GAME FEATURES ◆◆◆
- Smooth realistic character control
- Missions and upgrade abilities and system
- The ultimate character
- Three beautiful world scene
- Enthusiastic music , noises and sounds
- Beautiful UI , button , animation and effect
